attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_10_06, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Address Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in TLS SNI
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Address Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in TLS SNI"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; endswith; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047703; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_08_22;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction"; flow:established; app-layer-event:applayer_detect_protocol_only_one_direction; flowint:applayer.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2260002; rev:1;)

signature_info.comments: A comprehensive HTML validation tool for checking markup syntax and finding errors

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Scheduled temp file as task from temp location
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Scheduled temp file as task from temp location

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Script Execution From Temp Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious script executions from temporary folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

Adversaries may steal data by exfiltrating it over an un-encrypted network protocol other than that of the existing command and control channel.
The data may also be sent to an alternate network location from the main command and control server.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Hidden Executable In NTFS Alternate Data Stream
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of an ADS (Alternate Data Stream) that contains an executable by looking at a non-empty Imphash

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Unsigned DLL Loaded by Windows Utility
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects windows utilities loading an unsigned or untrusted DLL.
Adversaries often abuse those programs to proxy execution of malicious code.
Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Scheduled Task Creation via Masqueraded XML File
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a scheduled task using the "-XML" flag with a file without the '.xml' extension. This behavior could be indicative of potential defense evasion attempt during persistence
Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.
Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.
